Name: Song of a Spirit
About the game: Song of a Spirit is a Game Jam submission made in 14 days. It is a crafting game that explores an unconstrained approach to writing tunes, rhythms and melodies. Gameplay: Layout your note orbs in a classic linear or randomly placed fashion. Use the stone plated as timing indicators, place a pair of trigger totems in any orientation and launch an energy wave to trigger your note orbs from any direction. Mechanics Tone Wand 10 Sounds (4 Percussive & 6 Tonal) to experiment with Tone wand to Set, Retrieve, Trigger the Note orbs Trigger Totems for triggering Note Orbs from any direction Routing and trigger poles for connecting, routing and looping the music patterns Use sound and resources of the surrounding environment to craft various whimsical instruments.
